WRITING.TITLE: THF not NIN! - He'll steal your wallet, and your heart!

WRITING.TEXT: Gear List: Head: [Amatsu Hachigane](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Amatsu_Hachigane) Body: [Replica Sky Pirate's Vest of Aiming](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Replica_Sky_Pirate%27s_Vest_of_Aiming) (Nophica Green Dye) Hands: [Nabaath Gloves of Souting](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Nabaath_Gloves_of_Scouting) Legs: [Warg Sarouel of Scouting](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Warg_Sarouel_of_Scouting) Feet: [Dodore Boots](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Dodore_Boots)

Yeah, I agree. I always thought they should have done split classes for all the ARR jobs, like Arcanist going to Scholar or Summoner. In my head it would be Rogue become Ninja (tank maybe like FF11) or Thief a melee DPS. Would allow you to keep the feel of the job but play it in different roles.

WRITING.TITLE: Kapow! Blazing Blue Pilot, with optional flight helmet!

WRITING.TEXT: Gear Set: Weapon: [Deathlock Lux](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Deathlocke_Lux) Head: [Replica Sky Pirate's Cap of Casting](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Replica_Sky_Pirate%27s_Cap_of_Casting) (Soot Black Dye) I wear it when flying! ;) Body: [Alliance Jacket of Aiming](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Alliance_Jacket_of_Aiming) (Turquoise Blue Dye) Hands: [Archaeoskin Gloves of Gathering](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Archaeoskin_Gloves_of_Gathering) (Soot Black Dye) Legs: [Ivalician Sky Pirate's Trousers](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Ivalician_Sky_Pirate%27s_Trousers) Feet: [Replica Sky Pirates Boots of Aiming](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Replica_Sky_Pirate%27s_Boots_of_Aiming) (Soot Black Dye)

Weapon: [Senor Sabotender's Longbow](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Senor_Sabotender%27s_Longbow) Head: [Amon's Hat](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Amon%27s_Hat) Body: [Gambler's Trenchcoat](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Gambler%27s_Trenchcoat) (Rolanberry Red) Hands: [Amon's Sleeves](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Amon%27s_Sleeves) Legs: [Anemos Sauroel](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Anemos_Sarouel) (Rolanberry Red) Feet: [Gambler's Boots](https://ffxiv.gamerescape.com/wiki/Gambler%27s_Boots)
MFW Zenos is the main villain again...
A giant mushroom... MAYBE IT'S FRIENDLY!?
